title: Trulieve Sees Strong Growth, Weaker Earnings
itunes:title: Trulieve Sees Strong Growth, Weaker Earnings
description:
Kim Rivers, CEO of Trulieve, discusses the cannabis company's earnings and the progress of federal pot reform.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
